description: The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the Invesco Revenue Weighted Global Index (the "underlying index"). The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index, as well as American depositary receipts ("ADRs") and global depositary receipts ("GDRs") that represent securities in the underlying index. The underlying index is designed to measure the equity market performance of developed and emerging markets. The fund is non-diversified.
name: Invesco Global Revenue ETF
